pageContent: Objective: Thyroid surgery is common and complications are not rare. High-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) could be a possible minimally invasive alternative to surgery. The aim of this study was to assess the feasibility of using HIFU to obtain localized ablation of thyroid tissue without affecting neighboring structures.

metaData.source:
[Complications of transrectal biopsy of the prostate]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15989026/
